summary: First mod, cutting my teeth with Photoshop and wanted to do something different with this really cool armor
descriptionHtml:
So I decided to finally do something with the DDS plugin for Nvidia and Photoshop, this is one of my favourite armors to date and after working out how to fix the 1st person view in the wonderful TES5 edit I went ahead and made a retexture (I also have the fixed esp but the original mod author has never got back to me about permission to post it).

1st off, this is just a retexture of the Dark Disciple female armor only (so far), the Crimson Disciple and both versions of the male remain untouched.
 so you need the original file here:
Dark Disciple by betterbecause [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42398/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42398/?[/url]

pretty sure i've got the file structure right for NMM and MO (although you might want to use manual install on MO and set the right data directory)
NMM = just download with manager, click yes for overwrite.
MO = Business as usual for manual option once downloaded
Manual = Extract the zip somewhere and copy the contents of the Data folder into the Data folder in skyrim: usually computer/local disk (c:)/program files (x86)/steam/steamApps/common/Skyrim/data    and hit yes to overwrite/replace
----------------------------------------------------------------------

For the add ons in the screenshots try these guys out (even if you don't like my retexture) they are grand wee mods that don't get nearly enough attention.

Pauldrons _ Morrowind Style by Kai1995 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26617/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26617/?[/url]

Draugr Armor Parts by zzjay [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40316/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40316/?[/url]

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Graphic wise I'm using ICBINE 2 (on vanilla as i forgot to install Imaginator on latest reinstall)
ICBINE 2 by [b]ElSopa:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52718/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52718/?[/url]

[/b]Location is the ever so excellent:
Jaggarsfeld by xJACKTHERIPPERx and DarthXile [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38392/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38392/?[/url]
----------------------------------------------------------------------

3 options
4k, 2k, 1k (1k used in screenshots as I'm running my old backup graphics card)

Also for download is a zip with the jpegs showing you how to fix the 1st person view using TES5Edit by [b]ElminsterAU which if you don't already have it (it's a surprise to me) you can find here:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?[/url]
[/b]and there's also a great wee tutorial by Gopher on how to clean master files (which is a REALLY good idea) here:
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fw3g_N1jcZQ]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fw3g_N1jcZQ[/url]

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Hope you enjoy or at least find the walkthrough on how to fix the 1st person view helpful.

Bye Bye Y'all
author: ThingemieBOB
